summary:
This is a changeable dress.
You can change dress by spell.
descriptionHtml:
[b][i] [size=14]Introduction[/size][/i][/b]

I can't speak English well.

This is a changeable dress.
You can change a dress by spell.

[b][i][size=14]Requirement[/size][/i][/b]

[color=red]Skyrim 1.9.32+ and SKSE 1.6.13+ is required.
(Option) SKYUI 3.4+ is required.[/color]

[b][i] [size=14]Description[/size][/i][/b]

[youtube]k9HSZQNJQro[/youtube]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/NsuIT9j.jpg[/img]

[color=yellow]It supports the weight slider.[/color]

Here are armor, glove, & high-heels.
High-heels are 2 kind. Normal & HDT's real high-heel.

These are craftable & smithing at Daedric, DragonScale.

[color=yellow]You can get a spell ([Nausicaa] Change Dress Color) when armor equppied.[/color]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/5OBpCpX.png[/img]

[color=yellow](Option)It supports HDT's Highheel System.
HHS is real Highheel system.[/color]

Reference : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30980]Serenity Armor n Blade support HHS By Nausicaa[/url]

HDT's Highheel System : Current Version is alpha11 .

Download here :
HDT's HHS(Chinese) - original : [url=http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-3654925-1-1.html]http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-3654925-1-1.html[/url]

My Mirror(English translate) :[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?43s2s34gy9sjlh3]http://www.mediafire.com/?43s2s34gy9sjlh3[/url]

My Mirror2 (English translate) :[url=https://mega.co.nz/#!tFcWRJiQ!G_rengACdO7pTZ0aWAiiBXV24xdJaH6Sl-3NygBfJiI]https://mega.co.nz/#!tFcWRJiQ!G_rengACdO7pTZ0aWAiiBXV24xdJaH6Sl-3NygBfJiI[/url]


[b][i] [size=14]Compatibility[/size][/i][/b]

It was created based on CBBEv3M.
It is compatible CBBE3. (If you are CBBE3 user, you will use it without CBBEv3M body.)
author: Nausicaa
